Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: WB #103 buses will operate via 103rd, Longwood, 107th, and Western, then resume their normal route on 103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Westbound #103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Longwood, 107th, and Western, then resume their normal route on 103rd.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to construction on 103rd/Leavitt.

Headline: Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier debris on the tracks near 18th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier debris on the tracks near 18th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
